reasoning: Turn 4 optimization maximizes all three action slots with FREE ability activations. Triple-ability sequence: Valorian places 3 in Palace (highest VP square), Rothwell generates +5 gold for cycle-end conversion, Varro extends Barracks chain. Efficiency ratio maintained: maximum resource utilization with zero waste.
